org.openintents.tools.simulator.controller.sensor

类 WiiAccelerometerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openintents.tools.simulator.controller.sensor.WiiAccelerometerController

  • public class WiiAccelerometerController
extends java.lang.Object
    WiiAccelerometerController keeps the behaviour of the WiiAccelerometer sensor (listeners, etc.)
    作者:
    Dale Thatcher
